      • Kafka08JsonTableSource

        public Kafka08JsonTableSource(java.lang.String topic,
                              java.util.Properties properties,
                              org.apache.flink.table.api.TableSchema tableSchema,
                              org.apache.flink.table.api.TableSchema jsonSchema)
        Creates a Kafka 0.8 JSON StreamTableSource.
        参数:
        topic - Kafka topic to consume.
        properties - Properties for the Kafka consumer.
        tableSchema - The schema of the table.
        jsonSchema - The schema of the JSON messages to decode from Kafka.

    • 方法详细资料

      • setFailOnMissingField

        public void setFailOnMissingField(boolean failOnMissingField)
        Sets the flag that specifies the behavior in case of missing fields. TableSource will fail for missing fields if set to true. If set to false, the missing field is set to null.
        覆盖:
        setFailOnMissingField 在类中 KafkaJsonTableSource
        参数:
        failOnMissingField - Flag that specifies the TableSource behavior in case of missing fields.

      • setFieldMapping

        public void setFieldMapping(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> fieldMapping)
        Sets the mapping from table schema fields to JSON schema fields.
        覆盖:
        setFieldMapping 在类中 KafkaJsonTableSource
        参数:
        fieldMapping - The mapping from table schema fields to JSON schema fields.

      • setProctimeAttribute

        public void setProctimeAttribute(java.lang.String proctimeAttribute)
        Declares a field of the schema to be a processing time attribute.
        覆盖:
        setProctimeAttribute 在类中 KafkaTableSource
        参数:
        proctimeAttribute - The name of the field that becomes the processing time field.

      • setRowtimeAttributeDescriptor

        public void setRowtimeAttributeDescriptor(org.apache.flink.table.sources.RowtimeAttributeDescriptor rowtimeAttributeDescriptor)
